org.relationlearn.model

Interface ArgumentRelation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RelationImpl

    public interface ArgumentRelation
    The ArgumentRelation interface represents the link between two ArgumentNode objects and ultimately stores the RelationType value, which describes what kind of relation those nodes have.
    See Also:
    RelationType, ArgumentNode

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeRelationType(RelationType t)
      Sets the RelationType value of this relation to the value of the parameter t.
      ArgumentNode getArgumentator()
      Returns the ArgumentNode identified as the origin of this ArgumentRelation.
      int getArgumentRelationId()
      Returns this ArgumentRelation identifier.
      RelationType getArgumentRelationType()
      Returns a RelationType value that describes the current known state of this ArgumentRelation.
      ArgumentNode getTarget()
      Returns the ArgumentNode identified as the target of this ArgumentRelation.
